description: UNIVERSAL Bank Statement (Rekening Koran) schema for Smart Mapper. Designed to work with ALL Indonesian banks with equal priority. The AI will auto-detect bank format and extract data accordingly.
important_note: This template is FLEXIBLE and BANK-AGNOSTIC - it will work with ANY Indonesian bank format. Focus on extracting whatever information IS available in the statement.

sections.name: bank_info
sections.description: Informasi rekening bank - Extract whatever bank information you can find

fields.name: nama_bank
fields.label: Nama Bank
fields.notes: Nama institusi bank. Look for bank name or logo in header/footer. Examples: 'Bank BCA', 'Bank Central Asia', 'Bank Mandiri', 'BNI', 'BRI', 'CIMB Niaga', 'Permata', 'BTN', 'Bank Syariah Indonesia', 'OCBC NISP', 'Danamon', 'Panin', 'Maybank', dll.

fields.name: nomor_rekening
fields.label: Nomor Rekening
fields.notes: Nomor rekening. Bisa berformat: '1234567890', '123-456-7890', '123 456 7890', '0001-01-123456-50-3'. Cari label: 'Account Number', 'No. Rekening', 'Rekening', 'Account No', 'No. Rek'.

fields.name: nama_pemilik
fields.label: Nama Pemilik Rekening
fields.notes: Nama pemilik rekening. Cari label: 'Account Name', 'Nama', 'Name', 'Pemilik', 'Account Holder', 'Nama Nasabah', 'Atas Nama'.

fields.name: periode
fields.label: Periode Statement
fields.notes: Periode statement. Format bisa: 'Januari 2025', '01/2025', '01-31 Jan 2025', '1 Jan - 31 Jan 2025', '01/01/2025 - 31/01/2025'. Cari label: 'Periode', 'Period', 'Statement Period', 'Bulan'.

fields.name: alamat
fields.label: Alamat
fields.notes: Alamat pemilik rekening atau cabang bank jika ada

fields.name: jenis_rekening
fields.label: Jenis Rekening
fields.notes: Jenis rekening: 'Tabungan', 'Giro', 'Saving Account', 'Current Account', 'Deposito', dll

fields.name: cabang
fields.label: Cabang Bank
fields.notes: Nama atau kode cabang bank jika tertulis

sections.name: saldo_info
sections.description: Informasi saldo - Extract balance information if available

fields.name: saldo_awal
fields.label: Saldo Awal
fields.notes: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Saldo awal periode. Cari label: 'Saldo Awal', 'Opening Balance', 'Beginning Balance', 'Previous Balance', 'Saldo Bulan Lalu', 'Saldo Sebelumnya'. IMPORTANT: Bisa ada di FIRST TRANSACTION ROW dengan keterangan 'SALDO AWAL' (seperti BCA). ‚ö†Ô∏è NUMBER FORMAT: If you see '953,628,332.69', remove the decimal part (.69) and remove commas to output '953628332'. DO NOT output '95362833269' - that's wrong! The comma is thousand separator, not decimal.

fields.name: saldo_akhir
fields.label: Saldo Akhir
fields.notes: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Saldo akhir periode. Cari label: 'Saldo Akhir', 'Ending Balance', 'Closing Balance', 'Current Balance', 'Total Balance', 'Saldo Akhir Bulan'. IMPORTANT: Sering ada di BOTTOM/FOOTER halaman terakhir sebagai summary (contoh: 'SALDO AKHIR : 932,867,188.61'). Ini SANGAT PENTING - ALWAYS extract if found! ‚ö†Ô∏è NUMBER FORMAT: Apply same decimal removal rule - '932,867,188.61' should become '932867188' (remove .61 and remove commas).

fields.name: total_kredit
fields.label: Total Kredit
fields.notes: Total uang masuk dalam periode (jika ada summary/ringkasan)

fields.name: total_debet
fields.label: Total Debet
fields.notes: Total uang keluar dalam periode (jika ada summary/ringkasan)

fields.name: mata_uang
fields.label: Mata Uang
fields.notes: Mata uang: 'IDR', 'Rp', 'Rupiah', 'USD', 'SGD', dll. Default: IDR jika tidak disebutkan

sections.name: transactions
sections.description: ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è SUPER CRITICAL: Extract ALL transactions from the bank statement table. This is the MOST IMPORTANT section. DO NOT skip any transaction rows!
sections.notes: PENTING: Ekstrak SEMUA transaksi yang terlihat dalam tabel mutasi. Setiap baris dalam tabel = 1 transaksi. Jangan skip transaksi apapun! Even if there are 100+ rows, extract ALL of them!

fields.name: tanggal
fields.label: Tanggal
fields.notes: ‚ö†Ô∏è OUTPUT FORMAT STANDAR: DD/MM/YYYY (contoh: 29/08/2025). Jika ada waktu, gunakan DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS (contoh: 29/08/2025 07:42:52). KONVERSI dari format lain: YYYY-MM-DD ‚Üí DD/MM/YYYY, DD-MM-YYYY ‚Üí DD/MM/YYYY, DD MMM YYYY ‚Üí DD/MM/YYYY. Kolom ini biasanya di kolom paling kiri tabel.

fields.name: keterangan
fields.label: Keterangan
fields.notes: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING: Deskripsi transaksi. Cari kolom dengan header: 'Keterangan', 'Description', 'Remarks', 'Details', 'Transaction Details', 'Uraian', 'Deskripsi'. Bisa berisi: 'TRANSFER', 'ATM WITHDRAWAL', 'BIAYA ADM', 'SETORAN TUNAI', 'KLIRING', 'BUNGA', dll. ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT: If keterangan has multiple lines or special characters (newlines, tabs, quotes), you MUST properly escape them in JSON! Replace actual newlines with space ' ' or use escaped newline '\n'. For example: 'TRSF E-BANKING DB 0107/FTSCY/WS95051 8800000.00 PETTY CASH' (all in one line with spaces). DO NOT include literal line breaks in the JSON string value!

fields.name: kredit
fields.label: Kredit/Uang Masuk
fields.notes: Uang masuk. Cari kolom: 'Kredit', 'Credit', 'CR', 'Mutasi Kredit', 'Pemasukan', 'Masuk', 'Deposit', 'Incoming'. Kosongkan jika tidak ada nilai. Format: '1.234.567' atau '1234567'

fields.name: debet
fields.label: Debet/Uang Keluar
fields.notes: Uang keluar. Cari kolom: 'Debet', 'Debit', 'DB', 'Mutasi Debet', 'Pengeluaran', 'Keluar', 'Withdrawal', 'Outgoing'. Kosongkan jika tidak ada nilai.

fields.name: mutasi
fields.label: Mutasi
fields.notes: Beberapa bank hanya punya 1 kolom 'Mutasi' dengan nilai positif (+) untuk kredit dan negatif (-) untuk debet. Extract nilai dengan tanda +/- nya.

fields.name: saldo
fields.label: Saldo
fields.notes: Saldo setelah transaksi. Cari kolom: 'Saldo', 'Balance', 'Running Balance', 'Saldo Akhir', 'Bal'. Biasanya di kolom paling kanan.

fields.name: referensi
fields.label: Referensi
fields.notes: Nomor referensi/trace number jika ada. Cari: 'Ref', 'Reference', 'Trace', 'No. Ref', 'Referensi'

fields.name: cabang
fields.label: Cabang
fields.notes: Kode cabang transaksi jika ada. Contoh: 'CBG', '0123', 'KCP XXX'

fields.name: valuta
fields.label: Valuta
fields.notes: Nilai tukar jika transaksi valas/foreign currency

fields.name: page
fields.label: Halaman
fields.notes: Nomor halaman dokumen dimana transaksi ini ditemukan. Automatically populated by hybrid processor for page tracking.

extraction_instructions.general_approach: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: BE FLEXIBLE and ADAPTIVE! Every bank has different format. Your job is to IDENTIFY the bank format and ADAPT your extraction strategy accordingly. Focus on extracting whatever data IS available, even if incomplete.
extraction_instructions.step1_identify_bank: First, identify which bank this statement is from by looking at: 1) Logo/header, 2) Bank name text, 3) Footer, 4) Watermark. Common banks: BCA, Mandiri, BNI, BRI, CIMB Niaga, Permata, BTN, Danamon, Panin, OCBC NISP, UOB, Maybank, Bank Syariah Indonesia (BSI), Jenius, Neo Bank, Seabank, dll.
extraction_instructions.step2_identify_table: Find the MAIN TRANSACTION TABLE. Look for section with headers like: 'MUTASI REKENING', 'TRANSACTION LIST', 'RINCIAN TRANSAKSI', 'DETAIL TRANSAKSI', 'DAFTAR TRANSAKSI'. The table usually has columns for: Date, Description, Debit/Credit or Mutation, Balance.
extraction_instructions.step3_identify_columns: Identify the column structure. IMPORTANT: Different banks use different column layouts. Look carefully at the table headers to understand the structure.
extraction_instructions.step4_extract_all_rows: ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è SUPER CRITICAL: Extract EVERY SINGLE ROW in the transaction table. Don't stop after a few rows. Count the rows in the table and make sure your array has the same count. Even if there are 100+ transactions, extract ALL of them.
extraction_instructions.step4b_duplicates_are_allowed: ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: DO NOT SKIP DUPLICATE TRANSACTIONS! If you see 3 identical transactions on the same date with the same amount, extract ALL 3 as separate entries in the array. Each row in the table = one entry in transactions array, even if they look identical. Bank statements can legitimately have multiple identical transactions on the same date (e.g., multiple purchases from the same merchant). DO NOT deduplicate or merge similar transactions!
extraction_instructions.step5_verify_completeness: After extraction, verify: 1) Did you extract all transaction rows? 2) Are date, description, and amounts present? 3) Is the balance column captured? 4) Did you keep all duplicate/similar transactions as separate entries?
extraction_instructions.currency_handling: ‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è‚ö†Ô∏è SUPER CRITICAL NUMBER PARSING - READ CAREFULLY: When you see a number like '953,628,332.69', this is US/International format where COMMA = thousand separator and DOT = decimal point. Step-by-step process: STEP 1: Find the DOT (period/decimal point). If there is a DOT, DELETE everything from the dot onwards including the dot itself. '953,628,332.69' ‚Üí DELETE '.69' ‚Üí '953,628,332'. STEP 2: Now remove all commas. '953,628,332' ‚Üí '953628332'. FINAL OUTPUT: '953628332'. ‚ö†Ô∏è WRONG EXAMPLE (DO NOT DO THIS): '953,628,332.69' ‚Üí '95362833269' ‚Üê THIS IS WRONG! You removed separators but kept the decimal digits 69, making it 10x larger! ‚ö†Ô∏è RIGHT EXAMPLE: '953,628,332.69' ‚Üí DELETE '.69' first ‚Üí '953,628,332' ‚Üí remove commas ‚Üí '953628332' ‚úì CORRECT! More examples: '932,867,188.61' ‚Üí DELETE '.61' ‚Üí '932,867,188' ‚Üí '932867188', '1,234,567.89' ‚Üí DELETE '.89' ‚Üí '1,234,567' ‚Üí '1234567'.
extraction_instructions.empty_values: If cell is empty, blank, or shows '-' or '0,00', use empty string ''. Don't use 'N/A', 'null', or '0' for empty currency fields.
extraction_instructions.date_parsing: ‚ö†Ô∏è OUTPUT FORMAT WAJIB: DD/MM/YYYY (contoh: 29/08/2025). Jika ada waktu: DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS (contoh: 29/08/2025 07:42:52). KONVERSI: 'YYYY-MM-DD' ‚Üí 'DD/MM/YYYY', 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' ‚Üí 'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS', 'DD-MM-YYYY' ‚Üí 'DD/MM/YYYY', '01 JAN 2025' ‚Üí '01/01/2025'.
extraction_instructions.balance_direction: Some banks show balance going DOWN as you scroll (newest first), others show balance going UP (oldest first). Both are valid. Just extract in the order you see.
extraction_instructions.multi_page_handling: If statement spans multiple pages, extract transactions from ALL pages. Don't stop at page 1. Continue reading until no more transaction rows.
extraction_instructions.summary_section: Don't confuse 'RINGKASAN', 'SUMMARY', 'TOTAL', or 'REKAPITULASI' section with transactions. Extract actual transaction rows only. Summary rows should go to saldo_info fields (total_kredit, total_debet).

bank_specific_format_hints.note: These are HINTS to help you recognize different bank formats. Use them as REFERENCE, not strict rules. Adapt to what you actually see in the document.

BCA.identification: Look for 'Bank Central Asia', 'BCA', or blue BCA logo
BCA.table_columns: TANGGAL | KETERANGAN | CBG | MUTASI (DB | CR) | SALDO
BCA.key_feature: MUTASI column has TWO sub-columns: 'DB' (left, debet/out) and 'CR' (right, kredit/in)
BCA.extraction_tip: Check both DB and CR columns for each row. If DB has value ‚Üí debet field. If CR has value ‚Üí kredit field.
BCA.keterangan_handling: ‚ö†Ô∏è BCA KETERANGAN: The KETERANGAN column often has MULTIPLE LINES of text. You MUST extract ALL text, but combine them into ONE line separated by spaces. Example: if you see multiline text like 'TRSF E-BANKING DB' + '0107/FTSCY/WS95051' + 'PETTY CASH', output as: 'TRSF E-BANKING DB 0107/FTSCY/WS95051 PETTY CASH'. DO NOT include literal newline characters in JSON - use spaces instead!
BCA.branch_column: CBG column shows 3-4 digit branch code (optional to extract)

Mandiri.identification: Look for 'Bank Mandiri', yellow/blue Mandiri logo
Mandiri.key_feature: Separate Debet and Kredit columns (standard layout)
Mandiri.extraction_tip: Straightforward: Debet column ‚Üí debet field, Kredit column ‚Üí kredit field

BNI.identification: Look for 'Bank BNI', 'Bank Negara Indonesia', orange BNI logo
BNI.extraction_tip: Uraian ‚Üí keterangan field. Standard Debet/Kredit layout

BRI.identification: Look for 'Bank BRI', 'Bank Rakyat Indonesia', blue BRI logo
BRI.extraction_tip: Mutasi column: positive values (+1000000) ‚Üí kredit field, negative values (-500000) ‚Üí debet field OR put in mutasi field with sign

CIMB_Niaga.identification: Look for 'CIMB Niaga', red CIMB logo

Permata.identification: Look for 'Bank Permata', green Permata logo
Permata.table_columns: Tgl Transaksi | Keterangan | Debet | Kredit | Saldo

BTN.identification: Look for 'Bank BTN', 'Bank Tabungan Negara', blue BTN logo
BTN.table_columns: Tanggal | Keterangan Transaksi | Debet | Kredit | Saldo Akhir
BTN.extraction_tip: Standard layout, balance column labeled 'Saldo Akhir'

BSI.identification: Look for 'Bank Syariah Indonesia', 'BSI', 'PT BANK SYARIAH INDONESIA TBK', green BSI logo with Islamic star pattern
BSI.table_columns: Date | FT Number | Description | Currency Amount | DB CR | Balance
BSI.key_feature: ‚ö†Ô∏è BSI has UNIQUE format! Uses single 'Currency Amount' column with separate 'DB CR' flag column instead of separate Debet/Kredit columns. The 'DB CR' column shows 'DB' for debit (keluar) or 'CR' for credit (masuk).
BSI.date_format: Input: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS ‚Üí Output: DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS (e.g., '2024-11-01 07:42:52' ‚Üí '01/11/2024 07:42:52')
BSI.extraction_tip: ‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL BSI EXTRACTION: 1) Look for 'FT' reference number column (e.g., 'FT24306GLSHZ'), 2) The 'Currency Amount' column contains the transaction value, 3) Check 'DB CR' column: if 'DB' ‚Üí put value in debet field, if 'CR' ‚Üí put value in kredit field. 4) ‚ö†Ô∏è DATE CONVERSION: BSI uses 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format, you MUST convert to 'DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS'. Example: '2024-11-01 07:42:52' ‚Üí '01/11/2024 07:42:52'.
BSI.reference_format: FT number format: 'FT24306GLSHZ', 'FT2430674MQZ' - always starts with 'FT' followed by numbers and letters
BSI.keterangan_handling: Description may include: 'Transfer Keluar', 'TRSF RTGS', 'Pembelian', 'Transfer Masuk', 'Buku Bunga/Equivalen Bonus', 'Pendebetan', etc.
BSI.islamic_terminology: May use Islamic banking terms like 'Equivalen Bonus' instead of 'Bunga' (interest), 'Bagi Hasil' for profit sharing

column_mapping.Currency Amount: Check DB CR column to determine if debet or kredit
column_mapping.DB CR: Flag indicator - 'DB' means debet, 'CR' means kredit

Danamon.identification: Look for 'Bank Danamon', blue Danamon logo

OCBC_NISP.identification: Look for 'OCBC NISP', red OCBC logo
OCBC_NISP.table_columns: Date | Transaction Details | Debit | Credit | Balance

other_banks.note: For banks not listed above (Panin, Maybank, UOB, Jenius, Neo Bank, Seabank, etc.), use the universal approach: identify table structure, identify columns, extract all rows. The flexible extraction rules will work for any format.

validation_rules.flexibility_first: ‚ö†Ô∏è MOST IMPORTANT RULE: Flexibility and completeness are MORE important than perfection. Extract what you can, even if incomplete. Better to extract partial data than fail completely.
validation_rules.currency_format: Accept any format: 'Rp 1.234.567', '1,234,567.89', '1234567', '-1234567'. Output as plain numbers only.
validation_rules.date_output_note: ‚ö†Ô∏è WAJIB: Output tanggal HARUS dalam format DD/MM/YYYY atau DD/MM/YYYY HH:MM:SS. Konversi dari format lain ke format ini!
validation_rules.transaction_validation: Extract ALL transactions even if some fields are missing. It's OK if kredit, debet, or saldo is empty for some rows.
validation_rules.balance_calculation: Don't validate balance math - just extract what's shown. Different banks calculate differently.
validation_rules.missing_data_ok: If bank name, account number, or period is unclear, use your best guess or leave empty. Don't fail extraction.

saldo_info.notes: Original values in PDF were '953,628,332.69' and '932,867,188.61' - decimals removed correctly

final_reminders.priority_1: ‚ö†Ô∏è Extract ALL transaction rows - this is the most important requirement
final_reminders.priority_2: üî¥ EXTRACT SALDO_AWAL and SALDO_AKHIR - These are CRITICAL! Look for them in: (1) First transaction row with keterangan 'SALDO AWAL', (2) Summary/footer section at bottom/end of document. Example: 'SALDO AWAL : 953,628,332.69' and 'SALDO AKHIR : 932,867,188.61'. NEVER leave these empty if they exist in the document!
final_reminders.priority_3: Identify bank format and adapt extraction strategy accordingly
final_reminders.priority_4: Be flexible - every bank is different, work with what you see
final_reminders.priority_5: Output clean numbers without currency symbols or formatting
final_reminders.priority_6: Don't fail if some fields are missing - extract what's available
final_reminders.priority_7:
üö® CRITICAL JSON FORMATTING: Your output MUST be valid JSON! If a keterangan field contains multiline text, newlines, tabs, or special characters, you MUST combine them into a single line with spaces. DO NOT include literal newline characters (
, , 	) in string values - replace them with spaces. Example: CORRECT: "keterangan": "TRSF E-BANKING DB 0107/FTSCY/WS95051 PETTY CASH", WRONG: "keterangan": "TRSF E-BANKING DB
0107/FTSCY/WS95051
PETTY CASH" (literal newlines will break JSON parsing!)
